title: England v South Africa: second men’s one-day international – live
summary: England seeks redemption in the second ODI against South Africa at Lord’s following a heavy defeat in the first match. Fans can follow live updates and insights from the writers. The match is crucial for England to regain confidence and momentum.

title: Kazakhstan v Wales: World Cup 2026 qualifier – live
summary: Wales aims to maintain their positive momentum under coach Craig Bellamy following a lengthy journey to Astana. The match is closely monitored, with Barry Glendenning providing live updates. The team's performance will indicate how effectively they are adapting to their new leadership.

title: We Should Have Never Walked on the Moon review – riotous takeover of the Southbank Centre
summary: In an innovative performance, (La)Horde features a cast of 80 dancers who creatively spray-paint the pavement and utilize a 40-phone selfie stick. The event combines contemporary elements with dirty bass music, merging street art with classical ballet influences. This night showcases a captivating blend of movement and modern technology.

title: Macron says ‘Coalition of the Willing’ will finalise ‘robust’ Ukrainian security guarantees – Europe live
summary: World leaders gathered in Paris are set to engage in discussions with Donald Trump this afternoon. The talks are anticipated to address key global issues. This meeting highlights ongoing diplomatic efforts and relationships among nations.

title: Mussolini to Spider-Man: Lily Tomlin’s 10 best films – ranked!
summary: As comedy legend celebrates her 86th birthday, we highlight her top film performances, showcasing collaborations with Robert Altman, a memorable musical partnership with Meryl Streep, and the beginning of a 45-year double act. These roles illustrate her remarkable career and enduring impact on the film industry.
